Comment: This is just the beginning.  I advise democrats to ration their tears at this point, because they are going to need them in the coming weeks.
Author: BestSeattle

Comment: Turns out all the "nobody is above the law" mantra dems have been spouting the last few years was merely a hollow rallying cry they used to justify aggressive prosecutions of their political opponents including trump under a guise of being morally principled. Turns out, it was all predictably feigned for political expedience, and the very second democrat officials start being similarly held to the strict letter of the law their "principled stance" that "nobody is above the law" goes straight out the window as they quickly declare their judges and political operatives should in fact be above the law.
Author: TheSleepyTruth

Comment: Recently, yes. But historically the last 8 years and probably more, the FBI certainly is out of control. And don't forget, two things can be true at the same time.
Author: DreadPirateGriswold

Comment: They literally gave themselves unprecedented preemptive pardons, and have the audacity to talk about nobody being above the law. Democrats are the bigger criminals this country has ever seen and are trying to gaslight the public otherwise.
